passages.content:
TechGear Solutions - New Monitor Series
TechGear Solutions is proud to announce the release of our 'Vision' series monitors. All monitors in this series come with a 3-year limited warranty and blue-light reduction technology. Orders placed through our business portal receive a 5% discount for bulk purchases of 5 units or more.

passages.title: Vision Series Model Specifications
passages.footer: Availability: All models in stock except V-32U (Backordered until Oct 15).

passages.content:
From: Sam Reed <s.reed@designcorp.com>
To: TechGear Sales <sales@techgear.com>
Date: October 2
Subject: Inquiry about Model V-32U

Hello, I am interested in purchasing six units of your 32-inch 4K monitor for our design team. I see on your website that they are currently on backorder. If I place the order today via your business portal, will the 5% discount still apply? Also, please confirm if the estimated shipping date of October 15 is still accurate.

questions.q: What feature is included in all 'Vision' series monitors?
questions.explanation: 文書1に'blue-light reduction technology'が含まれると記載されています。

questions.q: Which model is Sam Reed interested in?
questions.explanation: 文書3の件名および「32-inch 4K monitor」という記述から、表にあるV-32Uであることがわかります。

questions.q: How much would the total be for one unit after the discount Sam Reed expects?
questions.explanation: V-32Uの定価は$450（文書2）。6台購入（5台以上）なので5%割引（文書1）が適用されます。$450 × 0.95 = $427.50 となります。
